root: ^So you're the little twerp who has been terrorizing my base!
^You're going to pay for all the trouble you have caused me today.
^It's a miracle that you have made it this far, but mark my words. YOU WILL NOT SURVIVE!
^Dozens of my best men are en route right now to obliterate you. In the meantime, I have encased myself in an inpenatrable pod.
^Good luck figuring out the pattern to unlock it! Hahaha!
